actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution designating the week commencing February 3, 1974, as "International Clergy Week in the United States" and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates the week commencing February 3, 1974, as "International Clergy Week in the United States". Authorizes and directs the President to issue a proclamation inviting the people of the United States to observe this week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the week commencing February 3, 1974, as "International Clergy Week in the United States" and for other purposes.
